name: Bastions Overview
guidance: A Bastion is a player character's home, stronghold, and place of power that develops over the campaign.
Bastions offer refuge and support projects like crafting, research, and other downtime activities.
Not every character needs a Bastion; players can opt in or out.
Bastions work best in campaigns with downtime between adventures.
